WorkItem.Description: when i was loading my holy paladin into rawr 2.0.3 there are no cloak enchants avaible i have tested ingame and my blood elf paladin gets 0.57% crit from greater agility to cloak. not sure what the ratio is for other races and classes ie. if its viable for destro warlocks too
WorkItem.Summary: changes to melee crit and spell crit not reflected on cloak enchant's selection.

Comments.Message:
...what? o.O

Agility gives gives crit for physical attacks only. Physical attacks are not relevant for holy paladins or destro locks, so Agility is not relevant, so enchants with just agility don't show up.
ill verify it ingame again the tooltip dosnt mention anything of melee crit it just says increase your crit by x amount.
...No, I'm sorry, Agility doesn't affect your spell crit rate.
